name: zzz
description: various ways to accomplish a todo application

scripts.pretest: docker-compose --file docker-compose-test.yml build && docker-compose -p todo-test --file docker-compose-test.yml up -d redis ddl
scripts.test: npm run test:api || docker-compose -p todo-test --file docker-compose-test.yml down
scripts.test:api: docker wait todo-test_ddl_1 && docker-compose -p todo-test --file docker-compose-test.yml run --no-deps --rm api test
